resources.string: Purchased via a Bundle, or Gift in the Store
The BEST War Thunder Wikipedia App.

ThunderDex was initially conceived in 2023.\nI was a frequent user of the War Thunder Wiki and got tired of using it on my browser.\nWith 10+ years of coding knowledge, I developed this app in a few months and decided to release it to everyone for FREE!
Click here to visit the link.
Coming back soon!\nA redesign is currently in development
üç¶ Launching the Easter Egg!\nCongrats on discovering it. üç¶

Click here to join the ThunderDex subreddit üòÅ
Dynamic Colors are not supported for your device
If the app crashes, just re-open it

Themes will end up being a PAID feature.

Themes are currently being tested, may not work properly or cause the app to crash

If that happens, just re-launch the app.
I will also be including some free themes.

Can't wait to show you what else the app has in store for 2024.
For the time being, you need to manually check, and uncheck the Theme that you want to properly disable it. Will be fixed soon.\n\nIF THE APP CRASHES OR CLOSES, RE-OPEN IT!
"This theme is not available on your device running Android "
Fragment is not attached, cannot launch activity.
"To enhance your experience, ThunderDex would like to send you notifications regarding important updates & alerts.\n\nPlease grant this permission to allow notifications."
Notification permissions are not required on this version.
You will not receive in-app messages for ThunderDex
‚Ä¢ Improvements to the vehicle image viewer
‚Ä¢ Once enough languages are added, create a language chooser option
‚Ä¢ Even more improvements to loading and performance
‚Ä¢ Adding more information and user requested information too
‚Ä¢ Add a War Thunder wallpaper section with a download ability from the site
‚Ä¢ Add app themes. (Dark themes only), check the Discord for more info (Join in the Settings)
‚Ä¢ Reduce the app size. Google Services libraries were added to the app which results in a larger apk
‚Ä¢ Switch vehicle info language based on user language if supported

5.5.0
‚Ä¢ New feature: Added an "Aircraft Cannons" and "Aircraft Machine Guns" sections(wiki > weaponry)
‚Ä¢ Instantly load news and updates
‚Ä¢ NEW! Bottom navigation UI with blur
‚Ä¢ NEW! in-app notifications permissions screen
‚Ä¢ New Theme: Halloween
‚Ä¢ Changed Slate Grey theme to just Grey
‚Ä¢ Grey theme: New colors
‚Ä¢ Fixed some Theme colors
‚Ä¢ Fixed themes issues
‚Ä¢ New and improved app icons
‚Ä¢ Sort news and updates by time, no more out of order news
‚Ä¢ Improved restart on theme apply
‚Ä¢ Improved logic for themes
‚Ä¢ Improved vehicle zoom animation
‚Ä¢ When the user denies the Notification permission, only show the message once instead of upon every launch
‚Ä¢ Improved Settings UI
‚Ä¢ Fixed airborne radar force close on android 9-11 (thanks bearcat29 on discord)
‚Ä¢ Make the airborne radar section background theme-compliant
‚Ä¢ Airborne Radar: dynamically set the expandable cardview background with material design for android 12+
‚Ä¢ Airborne Radar: change logic on how dynamic color is set for the expandable cardview
‚Ä¢ vehicle list: Fixed the bottom app bar overlapping the vehicles at the bottom (thanks bearcat29 on discord)
‚Ä¢ Fix Golden Eagle icon on dark themes
‚Ä¢ Update german translations (thanks flitzepipe on discord)
‚Ä¢ Fix header text glow cutoff
‚Ä¢ Update favorite vehicles instantly
‚Ä¢ Fixed weird characters in the app

5.1.0
‚Ä¢ NEW! image group images (helis, planes, tanks, ships)
‚Ä¢ NEW! "View Older Changelogs" in Settings > About
‚Ä¢ Fixed dynamic color theme not fully applying
‚Ä¢ Reduced app size
‚Ä¢ Force-apply dynamic theming for android 12+
- Thunderdex default theme is now dynamic for android 12+ devices 
‚Ä¢ Improved airborne radar UI, add dynamic theming elements for android 12+ and improve back navigation
‚Ä¢ Drastically improved the Vehicle Groups section (new images, improved zoom, slight redesigns and improvements, better Blur)
‚Ä¢ Bottom Navigation is now easier to see, increased visibility via user suggestion
‚Ä¢ Removed the textured background for the Home and Vehicle Information section
‚Ä¢ Updated and improved German translations (Thanks to Flitzepipe from Discord)
‚Ä¢ Updated 10 app libraries,, you may notice better performance
‚Ä¢ Updated animations again in the app, you should notice them
‚Ä¢ Updated Android Libraries and AGP
‚Ä¢ Fixed changelog in the app update being unscrollable, thanks to users who reported it

5.0.0:
‚Ä¢ Completely redesigned app! New animations, layouts, design, and more. App performance has been improved too
‚Ä¢ redesigned the home page and vehicle info page, vehicle group page, and vehicle list page
- Expanding on the info above, the news and updates now show 3 lines of text, and have a fading effect, as well as a slightly textured background
- Expanding on the info above, The vehicle info page has all new fonts, different fonts, a new layout, improved zoom, a darkened background animation, new gradient for the vehicle image, and a textured background
- Expanding on the info above, the vehicle group page hs been redesigned. The vehicle type (regular, premium, squad) color now covers the entire square layout, I changed the rounded corners for all 4 edges resulting in more of a square shape, and added an outline to the cards as well with a minimal shadow. Looks very nice with the different themes, especially the AMOLED black
- Expanding on the info above, The vehicle list page now has an animation that lightens the background
‚Ä¢ improved the about section and added shared transitions
‚Ä¢ Fixed the Settings header, now it looks boring but not buggy
‚Ä¢ Animations are now much smoother. Before, I applied a delay method to delay animations and stagger them or hold them off momentarily as content loaded. That has been removed resulting in smoother animations throughout the app
‚Ä¢ Improved all themes
‚Ä¢ Added new textured backgrounds for themes
‚Ä¢ Added back any missing themes
‚Ä¢ Fixed some themes not applying
‚Ä¢ in-app updates through the play store to make updates easier
- Expanding on the info above, the app will now prompt you upon launch to update the app, and will self-update to make it easier
‚Ä¢ brand new animations
‚Ä¢ new animations throughout the app
‚Ä¢ improved app performance
‚Ä¢ improved app memory usage
‚Ä¢ improved app stability
‚Ä¢ much, much more

4.5.1:
‚Ä¢ Android 9-11: added back changelog, fixed crash 
‚Ä¢ You can view the changelog in the About section now

Hello, and Thank you for using ThunderDex.

The BEST and ONLY War Thunder Wikipedia client for Android.

Please, consider donating if you are enjoying the app... a LOT of work goes into this free app.

You can donate by going into the settings of the app and clicking on the PayPal, or the Cash App option!

-HiFii

Add extra customization options (vehicle image size, etc)

Filter vehicles by rank instead of alphabetically

Add option to choose how vehicles are filtered

Improvements to the vehicle image viewer

Add an option to download selected vehicle images

Add more translations

Once enough languages are added, create a language chooser option

Even more improvements to loading and performance

Adding more information and user requested information too

Add a wallpaper section with a download ability!! (from the war thunder Wikipedia wallpaper site)

Thank you for considering a donation!


Send the payment to mbqonxda@gmail.com or select "Copy Email text" in the Dialog
Google Pay not installed! Launching Google Play Store‚Ä¶
